ZIF-95.synthesis: A solid mixture of zinc(II) nitrate tetrahydrate (Zn(NO3)2?4H2O, 1.044 g, 4.0 mmol) and cbIM (C7H5N2Cl, 6.106 g, 40.0 mmol) was dissolved in 295 ml DMF and 5 ml H2O in a 500 ml container.
The container was capped and heated at 120 uC for 72 h to give light yellow plate crystals.
The reaction mixture was allowed to cool gradually to room temperature and crystals were washed with DMF and dried in air (yield: 1.103 g, 75% for Zn(cbIM)2 ; based on Zn(NO3)2?4H2O).

ZIF-100.synthesis: Under a dry nitrogen atmosphere a solid mixture of zinc(II) trifluoromethanesulphonate (Zn(O3SCF3)2, 1.453 g, 4.0 mmol) and cbIM (6.103 g, 40.0 mmol) was dissolved in anhydrous DMF (270 ml) in a 500 ml container.
Subsequently, H2O (5.8 ml) was added, the container capped and heated in an isothermal oven at 120 uC for 48 h to give dark yellow cubic crystals.
The reaction mixture was allowed to cool naturally to room temperature and the crystals were washed with DMF and dried in air.
